```{r , echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(kableExtra))
code <- 799433
d <- readRDS("~/GoogleDrive/KBO/kbo_stats.rds")
d <- d[d$playerId == code,]
vars <- c("season","age","batPa","batHr","batOps","batBBpct","batSOpct","ISO","batBABIP","wRCplus","batWAR")
d <- na.omit(d[vars])
kable(d, digits = c(0,0,0,0,3,1,1,3,3,1,2), row.names = F, col.names = c("Season","Age","PA","HR","OPS","BB%","SO%","ISO","BABIP","wRC+","WAR")) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), fixed_thead = T)
```
